review: Unusable.  At first I thought the issue was that I didn't have a good enough WiFi signal, so I moved it right next to the router.  Now, the thing either freezes up completely or works so slowly and chopily (both problems requiring me to unplug/replug to fix) that it's easier for me to simply boot up my Xbox to watch Netflix or Hulu.

review: Rescued my Vizio TV ... our Smart TV was freezing and rebooting running Amazon Instant Video, was sluggish in its built-in apps generally, and I was facing replacing it (or getting it repaired at a cost of hundreds of dollars). Since all we want is Amazon Instant and Netflix, I thought maybe this device could help ... it did! This little stick is *fast* and the UI is better (clearer, faster), and it seldom has any problems ... now the big TV is just a monitor, and it works well. The remote control is simple enough to live with, too. All in all, the best video investment we've ever made.
author: Amazon Customer
